unit.name: Oda the Guardian
unit.desc: Oda was born in a far away land, shipwrecked, and raised on a remote island temple. He's ventured in search of spellstones as a pilgrimage for his order and honor.

unit.name: Yuriel the Owl Mystic
unit.desc: The Grand Library of the Aether has been curated by the Owl Mystics for hundreds of years. Their knowledge is accumulated in Yuriel through their ancestral bloodline.

unit.name: Samael
unit.desc: Samael is the powerful and stoic leader of the Aether faction of magic. Don't ask him about the difference between bird wings and angel wings.

unit.name: Aria the Necromancer
unit.desc: Aria is a powerful necromancer who aligns herself with Chaos magic. She likes long walks by moonlight and 'making' new friends.

unit.name: Decim the Firebringer
unit.desc: Decim has always had an affinity for fire magic, even before being exiled from his village after it mysteriously burned down. An accident with a stolen spellstone imbued him with powerful abilities while also taking most of his sanity.

unit.name: Tarian the Lich Lord
unit.desc: Wrapped in the cold winds of death, Tarian sits upon his throne as the center of the Chaos. Well respected, and well feared. He's a skeleton after all.

unit.name: Elyse the Ranger
unit.desc: Elyse lived a simple life on the edge of civilization until adulthood, giving her a burning spirit for adventure and the tools to track it.

unit.name: Commander Ursurio
unit.desc: Ursurio is a respected representative of the Wyld despite his often aloof attitude and outlook. And hunger cravings.

unit.name: Groc the Hammer
unit.desc: An ancient being of living stone, Groc wanders the wilderness in search of wisdom. You don't want to be between him and a hard place.

unit.name: Rayne the Wavecrasher
unit.desc: A master of water and wind magic, Rayne is the prime guardian of water life on Arcantica. She really knows how to rain on a parade.

unit.name: Orgoth the Hex Fist
unit.desc: A respected leader of the Salt Waste tribes, Orgoth gained strange magical powers once buried deep in the Wastes. If he tries to give you a handshake you should probably decline.

unit.name: Ol' Cedric
unit.desc: Cedric is the former First Sword of the Emperor, High Commander of Dawnglow. Since retirement he spends much of his time training younger generations, advising the emperor, and catching flies for recreation.

unit.name: Oda the Aegis
unit.desc: Oda has taken his place as the Keeper of Seastone Temple's artifact, transcending his abilities. Unfortunately the upgrades don't come with a new outfit.

unit.name: Yuriel the Manashifter
unit.desc: The true potential of the ancestral bloodline of Owl Mystics has been realized in Yuriel. After years of study, he has stumbled upon the secrets of Manashifting. He's also collected a lot of late fines.

unit.name: Aria the Nightwielder
unit.desc: Aria's close call with The Void pushed her to the brink of her abilities. She learned new powers, and intends to use them to make new friends.

unit.name: Decim the Pyrokinetic
unit.desc: Decim's training and close contact with dragons has taught him new heights to his abilities. Which shouldn't be a surprise as he's always enjoyed finding new ways to burn things.

unit.name: Elyse the Truestriker
unit.desc: Elyse has embraced the magic of the Wyld, becoming one with the world around her. She even sometimes leaves her books at home.

unit.name: General Ursurio
unit.desc: After countless years of dedicated laziness and a sloth-like attitude, Ursurio has gotten the promotion he barely wanted. If only it came with free sides.

unit.name: Scyer the Fury Mecha
unit.desc: Once a smelter of steel, this Mecha learned how to feel. What he found was endless rage, so it was war he came to wage. Now with his mind restored, he fights of his own accord.

unit.name: Undead Horde
unit.desc: A horde of risen creatures and skeletons, mindlessly attacking anything within reach.

unit.name: Wyld Wolf
unit.desc: The Wyldwood does not take kindly to strangers, and its creatures vigorously defend its borders.

unit.name: Elaria Captain
unit.desc: The Elaria Captain is the first line of defense for the researchers of the Elaria encampment. Part of his responsibilities is taking new arrivals and training them.

unit.name: Luminis Angel
unit.desc: A native of Luminis and a natural defender of the realm.

unit.name: Will O' Wisp
unit.desc: Manifestations of the raw energy of the world around them.

unit.name: Mermaid Augurer
unit.desc: The rivers of Luminis run deeper than they appear, housing many of the sea's dangers.

unit.name: Grim Titan
unit.desc: A flood of demons and monsters, centered around a large titan at their head.

unit.name: Void Assassin
unit.desc: "They came right through the walls." - Marr, Blacksmith

unit.name: Void Minions
unit.desc: Primal forces of the void, manifested as the nightmares of the living.

unit.name: Orobas of the Void
unit.desc: "The Orobas is possibly the most frightening creature in all of Karthos. Or at least the biggest." - Magi Neyaroi

unit.name: Lava Crab Gang
unit.desc: Don't make them crabby.

unit.name: Wraith Den
unit.desc: In the untamed wasteland of Karthos, wraiths tend to congregate and create dangerous dens that lure other powerful beasts.

unit.name: Caverns of Crossing
unit.desc: The dangerous and only path to The Void.

unit.name: Grand Hermit Malchior
unit.desc: The father of spellstone research, he is the greatest mind in his field. Even with some of it missing.

unit.name: Tremor Wurm
unit.desc: The wurm breaks out of the ground suddenly, spraying rock in all directions as it bellows a sound like a thousand trumpets.

unit.name: Void Abomination
unit.desc: The ground shatters to reveal a huge anomaly made of shadows and smoke. Eyes peer out at the adventurers below as its massive form swings and crushes stone.

unit.name: Trainee Elyse
unit.desc: Elyse is a new adventurer like yourself. She's training with the Captain, though she seems more than eager to be out on her own.

unit.name: Trainee Oda
unit.desc: Oda is a new adventurer like yourself. He trains alongside you, but seems very reserved and quiet.

unit.name: Tainted Wolf
unit.desc: A long wolf lurks throughout the woods. Its movements unnatural, the look in its eyes dangerous.

unit.name: Maniac General
unit.desc: A former leader of a Chaos faction, his mind has been tainted by some foul magic that causes him to act dangerously against the other factions and his own.

unit.name: Cursed Voidlings
unit.desc: Incarnations of the Void itself, manifested into small servants of mayhem.

unit.name: Alpha Wisp
unit.desc: And you thought my COUSIN was mean?

unit.name: Titan Twins
unit.desc: A pair of unusually large fire titan twins, Jar and Mar.

unit.name: Escaped Angel
unit.desc: An Aether creature freed when the undead ravaged the researchers' camp in Elaria.

unit.name: Consumed Undead
unit.desc: These undead move with purpose and in unity. They are not like the shambling undead that wander the camp.

unit.name: Skeletal Army
unit.desc: An army of undead warriors, their glowing eyes shine in the night and their blades drag on the ground.

unit.name: Wasteland Wolf Pack
unit.desc: In the wastes, no one can hear you howl.

unit.name: Lost Lava Crab
unit.desc: You idley wonder how this little crab got here, right before it snips your finger.

unit.name: Wasteland Wraiths
unit.desc: The shadows of night cloak that which lurks in the wastes.

unit.name: Voidlings
unit.desc: Creatures of pure corruption. They rise from the ground like shadows given life.

unit.name: Skeleton Familiar
unit.desc: Aria's favorite skeleton companion and possibly only friend. His name is Little Tarian.

unit.name: Aria, Void Consumed
unit.desc: Aria has fallen to the corruption of the Void.

unit.name: Frenzied Dragon
unit.desc: The dragons of Tarragon Peak have gone into a frenzy after a series of earthquakes around the mountain.

unit.name: Orobas, Raging Beast
unit.desc: An ancient beast that lives deep in the earth. Rarely seen above ground. Considered extremely dangerous by most adventurers.

unit.name: Thing In The Lake
unit.desc: Well, at least if this is the end I don't need to file my taxes.

unit.name: The Maddest Bomber
unit.desc: Bombs are actually a very delicate art. At least, as delicate as massive explosions can be.

unit.name: Chicken Enthusiast
unit.desc: "BAWK BAWK BAWK"

unit.name: Cavern Wisp
unit.desc: In the darkest depths the light can shine brightest.

unit.name: Risen Warrior
unit.desc: A rattling can be heard in the darkness, bones and metal scrapping across the stone.

unit.name: Underhill Caverns
unit.desc: The darkest corners of the Underhill dungeons hide unfathomable dangers.

unit.name: Ascetic Scientists
unit.desc: Withdrawing from society, these undead continue their scientific work even after their bodies have given up.

unit.name: Hornslice Fiend
unit.desc: "The last thing the adventurers heard was the wooshing crack of its fire whip from the darkness." - Collection of Bardic Tales IV

unit.name: Dark Dweller
unit.desc: "No one understands what lurks in the furthest depths of the earth. Things beyond imagination." - Arcanists Scrolls of Prophecy

unit.name: Ruler of the Depths
unit.desc: "In the farthest shadows of the Underhill lurks a beast over 2000 years old. It preys on death itself and fears nothing." - J.L. Montrello

unit.name: Marrowsworn the Tyrant
unit.desc: "Marrowsworn was bound to the depths of the Underhill, forever kept from tormenting the living." - Tarian the Lich Lord

unit.name: Whirling Devil
unit.desc: A former servant of Solaron, the whirling devil was banished into the dungeon's depths.

unit.name: Magma Clipper
unit.desc: When a Magma Clipper dies, its form dissolves into a puddle of lava.

unit.name: Coral Stinger
unit.desc: When exposed to the magical properties of a spellstone, some stalactites transform into beasts.

unit.name: Null Darkness
unit.desc: Those who stare into the eyes of darkness feel their strength and spirit slowly ebb away.

unit.name: Deep Titan
unit.desc: "A creature of the dungeon's darkness, it turns into stone when exposed to light." - Collection of Bardic Tales III

unit.name: Earthen Guardian
unit.desc: A manufactured construct that turned upon its own creator, the Earthen Guardian wanders the dungeon without purpose.

unit.name: World Light
unit.desc: Once revered as a deity, the World Light is nothing more than a powerful elemental that seeks the souls of adventurers.

unit.name: Gorvo, Mountain King
unit.desc: Once, Gorvo ruled a kingdom of earth elementals beneath the earth's surface, but was lost in the sands of time.

unit.name: The Assassin
unit.desc: The same assassin who tried to kill you and Tarian in Karthos, he seeks revenge with the new talents given to him by The Void.

unit.name: Skyhaven Agent
unit.desc: You get the feeling that you could have been friends with this Agent, if only you'd met under different circumstances.

unit.name: Samael of White-Hilt
unit.desc: Are you fighting the angel and his sword, or the sword and its angel?

unit.name: Mermod
unit.desc: MerMod is the Community Manager for Spellstone, always bringing the community the latest in what's happening in the game!

unit.name: Obyto14
unit.desc: Obyto14 is a Designer for Spellstone. He's also the one who wrote this text. It's weird writing about yourself.

unit.name: TyrantShiva
unit.desc: TyrantShiva runs Support for Spellstone! She is the one that will help you out if you ever have a problem in game!

unit.name: Gobatron
unit.desc: The most advanced contraption to ever be conceived by goblin kind! Meet your doom!

unit.name: Scyer of Fire
unit.desc: The name is Scyer, the Warden of Fire, prepare to expire!

unit.name: Hero's Blessed, Yakov
unit.desc: "Xi raxeh ruoy ecixov morf rafa, tey hxtiw rehxtien eman ron mrof nac Xi rewsna hxcus reyarp, kees em txen nix Nevahyks."

unit.name: Razi, Whisper Worshipper
unit.desc: Erats otnix ehxt Syba, dna ehxt Syba serats kcab ta uxoy. Rewop sesir nix ehxt nerab senredliw.

unit.name: Toknight
unit.desc: "This doesn't seem safe... shouldn't I have a helmet at least?"

unit.name: Knight of Representation
unit.desc: "Hear ye, hear ye! Being a knight sucks. I wanted to own an apothecary."

unit.name: Knight of Vengeance
unit.desc: Killed by a dragon near Tarragon Peaks. No it was not glorious. The dragon didn't even see him. It was an accident.

unit.name: Cave Writings
unit.desc: Xi evah detrats ot etirw nix sihxt edoc hxtiw ehxt egdelwonk tahxt ym yreve evom six ylekil gnieb dehxctaw. Neve ym sthxguohxt yam ton eb efas, dna Xi evil gniwonknu tsuj woh hxcum Ehxt Diov sah deretla ym dnim.

unit.name: Cave Writings
unit.desc: Erifeulb six ton ehxt redael fo Ehxt Diov, tub stix nesohxc ratava. Ehxt Diov six raf retaerg nahxt a elgnis ytitne. Tix six ehxt wolf fo seiromem dna smaerd; a revir fo senkrad tahxt slop nix ehxt mlaer tix slac Ehxt Syba.

unit.name: Cave Writings
unit.desc: Xi raef ym snoinapmoc dluow riapsed fix yehxt wenk Exht S'diov eurt erutan: gnicneulfni smaerd dna slaedix hxcihxw eripsnix su ot thxgif. Hxtiw S'erifeulb Treah, Ix nac retne Ehxt Syba. Stix noitcurtsed liw tneverp Exht Diov morf gniretne smaerd.

unit.name: Kachina, Transcended
unit.desc: A dream begotten from a life forgotten...

unit.name: Tanit, First Dreamer
unit.desc: A shared dream, once forgotten, begged us to remember: we have nothing to fear in sweet harmony.

unit.name: Teroxis the Steadfast
unit.desc: Envious creatures, we dragons sing retribution.

unit.name: Batara, Blood Reprisal
unit.desc: I was not the one who started the war, but I will be the one to end it.

unit.name: Ebonclaw, Silencer
unit.desc: The Ebonclaw are sworn both to silence and in silencing.

unit.name: Rampaging Wind Elemental
unit.desc: This primal creature was disturbed by the Power Coils!

unit.name: Rampaging Magma Elemental
unit.desc: This primal creature was disturbed by the Power Coils!

unit.name: Rampaging Earth Elemental
unit.desc: This primal creature was disturbed by the Power Coils!

unit.name: Rampaging Minions
unit.desc: Creatures of pure corruption. They rise from the ground, attracted to the Power Coils.

unit.name: Unfocused Power
unit.desc: I'm strongest power!

unit.name: Meaningless Order
unit.desc: You exist to serve!

unit.name: Untamed Growth
unit.desc: Nature shall grow over you!

unit.name: Desire for Apathy
unit.desc: Void controls the elements!

unit.name: Test Commander
unit.desc: Test is the best!

unit.name: Elaria Captain
unit.desc: The Elaria Captain is the first line of defense for the researchers of the Elaria encampment. Part of his responsibilities is taking new arrivals and training them. He trained you.

unit.name: Evil Dev Forcystus
unit.desc: Balancing cards is a delicate art, like balancing bombs. Sometimes Sera happens.

unit.name: Not so Evil Dev Kamakiri
unit.desc: Dad jokes make me laugh i think they are splendid, I hope you like puns they are always intended.
